normalized: it was the day after i had planted the bug inside cara.

name: cara
normalized: good morning, everyone.
cara and marika came to the dining hall, where kitae and i were sitting.

name: marika
normalized: miss cara, here you are.

name: cara
normalized: thank you.
she smiled at her servant, who had brought her her meal.
her face didn't seem to be much different than usual.
if i had to, then i could say that her cheeks seemed to be slightly red.
i couldn't believe that she could still have such an expression on her face, despite being injected with such a large amount of aphrodisiac…
the rubbing of her clothes against her skin was bound to be assaulting her with intense sexual stimulation.
however, i was certain that she couldn't be like this forever.
i was definitely going to transform that smiling face of hers into that of a lustful bitch in-heat.
a woman in red staggered into the dining hall with her head in her hands, entirely like a zombie, while i was staring at the queen.

name: yamakawa
normalized: ah!
professor kamimura, a very good morning to you.

name: azuma
normalized: morniing～～ aah… haa… aah… i have a pretty bad headache…

name: kitae
normalized: uwaah… do you have a hangover?
alright, here you are.

name: azuma
normalized: ah?
cheers… gokyu!
gokyu!
gokyu!
gokyu!
haa…!
she snatched the glass of water, that had been handed to her, and gulped it down in one swoop, similar to the manner in which she had had alcohol the night before.

name: cara
normalized: after all, azuma is a human, isn't she?

name: azuma
normalized: the queen is the only one… who can drink as much as me… after all, she is a monster…

name: marika
normalized: how rude.

name: kitae
normalized: you drink too much, professor.

name: azuma
normalized: we haven't managed to discover the whereabouts of the missing student yet, have we?
that's why i had as much as i did…

name: kitae
normalized: please don't blame it on that student.
yesterday, kamimura the hunter had gone out in order to conduct a search for the student, who had disappeared.
she had requested the assistance of an acquaintance of hers from the same field, however, that agent had been unable to gather any information concerning this matter whatsoever.

she wanted to discover the student as soon as possible, as she was anxious that she might be in some kind of danger and, as a result, had spent yesterday's entire night drinking her fears away, while griping about it.

name: azuma
normalized: director, i'm going out today as well… i still have some hope left…

name: kitae
normalized: i understand.
please be careful as well.

name: azuma
normalized: and you all from this place as well, director…

name: kitae
normalized: we all?

name: azuma
normalized: i have been getting a bad feeling every day… as if something strange is going on within the school…
the weary frown that she had on her face, due to the hangover, deepened.
tch… her sixth sense was really sharp.

name: azuma
normalized: has nothing happened?

name: kitae
normalized: even though there haven't been any problems when it comes to the spirit-barrier, i am curious if you are the one suggesting it, professor.
cara, what about you?

name: cara
normalized: hm?
what is it?
she was sipping her coffee, as if she wasn't interested in our conversation.

name: kitae
normalized: don't you feel some kind of unease concerning the atmosphere within the school?

name: cara
normalized: well, i am getting a bad feeling, similar to hers.
however, i am not too sure about it.
the queen said that without even looking at kitae, as if she didn't want her coffee time to be interrupted.
… this kind of attitude… from cara…?
there was something discomforting about it.
she should have responded to that question seriously, based on her usual demeanour.
moreover, she hadn't even been shocked yesterday, when she discovered that kitae was being manipulated by me.
in other words, she already had a feeling about it in her heart, similar to a hunch.
despite that, why was she being so disinterested now?

name: kitae
normalized: anyway, let each of us be careful.
i will address the other teachers as well.

name: yamakawa
normalized: i agree.

name: azuma
normalized: yees…
marika nodded as well, however, cara seemed to be completely indifferent.
as soon as the first class came to an end, marika appeared in the corridor with perfect timing, in order to pick cara up as usual.

name: marika
normalized: yoshiki.

name: yamakawa
normalized: hah?
yes…

name: student
normalized: huh?
isn't it unusual to see professor marika talking with professor yamakawa?

name: student
normalized: this is the first time that i am seeing professor marika talk to someone other than professor cara.
tch…

name: marika
normalized: i want to ask you something.
what the students were saying was absolutely true.
marika, who would usually never talk to me, wanted to speak to me without caring about that fact.
i wanted to keep unusual incidents from being observed by the students, if i could help it.
